channel.title: Digital Mortgage – Banking, Loans, Credit Cards | iBank & Co.

item.title: Document AI for Mortgage Lenders
item.dc:creator: wesbowen
item.description: In the mortgage industry, early adopters of document automation technologies were underwhelmed with the results of their investment. The latest advancements in AI can cut the lengthy mortgage origination cycle significantly and reduce errors.
